cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 21st Dec 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 21st Dec 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Basic 7 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: All 7 beds are fully made up and there is heating in every room to ensure you are cosy. Guests can use the fully equipped kitchen. There are two fridges. Instant coffee, tea and sugar are provided.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: The queen bed is fully made up and there is heating in every room to ensure you are cosy. Guests can use the fully equipped kitchen. There are two fridges. Instant coffee, tea and sugar are provided.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only

privates.name: Deluxe 3 Bed Family Room Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: All our private unit rooms (1 Single bed + 1 Queen bed) are very quiet situated in our spacious mature garden in the back. They have a little veranda, bistro table set, kettle and cups. Will provide heating blankets on winter.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
